findings.title: Deployer Can Update Total Tax Up to 100%
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to update total tax up to 100%, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can update marketing share/staking tax up to 100%
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to update marketing share and staking tax up to 100%, which could lead to potential manipulation of token economics.

findings.title: Deployer can collect ETH from marketing balance
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to collect Ether from the marketing balance, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can release liquidity tokens after liquidity time lock is over to development address
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to release liquidity tokens after the liquidity time lock has expired and transfer them to the development address.

findings.title: Deployer Can Collect ETH from Contract After Liquidity Time Lock
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to collect Ether from the contract after the liquidity time lock is over and transfer it to the development address.

findings.title: Deployer can transfer contract's balance to liquidity pool
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to transfer the entire balance of the contract to a liquidity pool.

findings.title: Deployer can update max sell transaction amount
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to update the maximum sell transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can update max wallet amount
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to update the maximum wallet amount, which may lead to unintended consequences or security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can block/unblock user address
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to block or unblock a user's address.

findings.title: Deployer can change max buy transaction with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to modify the maximum buy transaction amount without any limitations.

findings.title: Deployer can toggle buy/sell cooldown
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to toggle the buy/sell cooldown, which may lead to unintended consequences or manipulation of the contract's functionality.

findings.title: Deployer can update buy/sell cooldown time
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to update the buy/sell cooldown time, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can update amount to swap tokens
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to update the amount of tokens to be swapped, which could lead to potential manipulation or exploitation.

findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Deployer cannot pause contract
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to pause the contract.
